meanings.definition: A group of rough or violent individuals.
meanings.sent1: The pluguglies caused trouble at the park.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was afraid of the pluguglies who roamed the streets.
meanings.sent3: The pluguglies tried to start a water balloon fight but ended up soaking everyone.
meanings.sent4: The pluguglies in the movie were like a pack of wild wolves, causing chaos wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pluguglies loitering on the corner was hard to forget.

meanings.sent1: He tends to pluguglies when he gets angry.
meanings.sent2: The bullies began to pluguglies when they didn't get their way.
meanings.sent3: The cat pluguglies at the dog whenever it comes near its food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The storm pluguglies through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The car engine pluguglies as it struggles to start on a cold morning.

meanings.sent1: She felt like a pluguglies among the glamorous celebrities.
meanings.sent2: The villain in the story was portrayed as a real pluguglies.
meanings.sent3: The pluguglies at the party kept telling bad jokes that no one laughed at.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a slap in the face, making her feel like a pluguglies.
meanings.sent5: The old abandoned house looked like a haunted mansion, giving off a pluguglies vibe.
